name: matr!x
description:
We’re Matrix, a full service creative agency specialising in graphic design, website design, branding, digital, print and marketing.
Situated in Ivybridge, we serve businesses throughout Plymouth, Exeter and Devon. We’re a tightly-knit, friendly and extremely flexible team with a refreshing enthusiasm for achieving results.
Established in 2002, our extensive experience combined with a policy of total professionalism, has earned us an impressive reputation for excellence.
